meanings.sent1: The cabin was located in the remotest part of the forest.
meanings.sent2: The island was so remote that it took days to reach even the remotest village.
meanings.sent3: The idea of finding a lost treasure in the remotest corner of the world sounded like a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of the remotest past came flooding back when she visited her childhood home.
meanings.sent5: The remotest star in the sky shone brightly, guiding the lost travelers.

meanings.definition: Slightest or smallest in degree or likelihood
meanings.sent1: There was not even the remotest chance of rain during the dry season.
meanings.sent2: His hope of winning the lottery was the remotest possibility in his mind.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin flying was the remotest thought that crossed his mind.
meanings.sent4: The possibility of finding a needle in a haystack seemed more likely than the remotest chance of success.
meanings.sent5: The remotest hint of a smile on her face showed her true feelings.
